entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Agassiz
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:08 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Agassiz 03:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -3.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -4.4°C
Wind: SSW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Ice pellets mixed with freezing rain changing to freezing rain near midnight. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h except gusting to 60 near Agassiz. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy or freezing rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Freezing rain at times heavy changing to rain at times heavy in the morning. Rainfall amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h except gusting to 60 near Agassiz in the morning. Wind becoming light near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain at times heavy. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022
